message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000.  It's in excellent condition and worth every penny.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product and would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $12,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500,  which is still a fair price considering the value of this product.  Let's meet in the middle and see if we can close this deal.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $13,000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
